channel.title: CVE Feed for Xithrius -- twitch-tui
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xithrius -- twitch-tui

item.title: CVE-2023-38688|2024-10-09T16:26:21.732Z -- xithrius -- twitch-tui
item.description: twitch-tui provides Twitch chat in a terminal. Prior to version 2.4.1, the connection is not using TLS for communication. In the configuration of the irc connection, the software disables TLS, which makes all communication to Twitch IRC servers unencrypted. As a result, communication, including auth tokens, can be sniffed. Version 2.4.1 has a patch for this issue.
